title: AI Study Assistant – Hybrid C++ & Web Application
description: An AI-powered study assistant built with a high-performance C++ backend and a modern web frontend. The core system handles topic management, note-taking, MCQ generation, progress tracking, and Google Gemini AI–based Q&A. A Node.js wrapper exposes the C++ engine to a browser-based UI, demonstrating a hybrid approach that combines systems programming with AI-assisted full-stack development.
